tn.text: This is an area where things are kept or stored.

tn.ref: at the feast, which was in the seventh month
tn.text: This is the Festival of Shelters which is on the fifteenth day of the seventh month of the Hebrew calendar. This is near the beginning of October on Western calendars. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_hebrewmonths]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:translate_ordinal]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:2ch:04:19|4:19]]

tn.ref: sheep and oxen that could not be counted

tn.text: This refers to a time when the book of 2 Chronicles was written. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])
The same three led the worship when David moved the ark to Jerusalem. David later appointed them as the temple musicians. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
two thin, round metal plates that are hit together to make a loud sound (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:2ch:05:11|5:12]].
